property.value: Deck Size: 30. Deckbulding Options: Seeker cards (λ) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Vault of Knowledge, Thrice-Damned Curiosity, 1 random basic weakness.

property.value: Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. You have 2 additional ally slots, which can only be used to hold Miskatonic assets. Forced – When you take damage or horror: No more than 1 of that damage/horror can be assigned to a Miskatonic asset.
